name: express-template
description: A template to build simple, responsive prototypes.
author: Jasal Vadgama - http://blacklabelcreative.com/

scripts.copy: npm run copy:data && npm run copy:fonts && npm run copy:images
scripts.build:script: npm run test:script && mkdir -p $npm_package_config_build_dir/js && ./node_modules/.bin/browserify ./src/js/script.js -o $npm_package_config_build_dir/js/script.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run test:script
scripts.build: npm run copy && npm run build:css && npm run build:script
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:css && npm run deploy:script
scripts.watch: npm run build && parallelshell 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:images' 'npm run watch:script'
scripts.watch:nodemon: npm run build && parallelshell 'nodemon app.js' 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:images' 'npm run watch:script'
scripts.watch:node: npm run build && parallelshell 'node app.js' 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:images' 'npm run watch:script'
